20101218080545.333|20101218080548.667|CCO|CALL OF THE WILD DELIVERED ONE 
20101218080548.667|20101218080552.000|CCO|HAPLESS CANINE.
20101218080552.000|20101218080554.000|CCO|A CHICAGO AREA COYOTE INTO THE 
20101218080554.000|20101218080556.000|CCO|HANDS OF MAN TODAY.
20101218080556.000|20101218080558.000|CCO|POLICE SAY THE FEMALE ANIMAL WAS
20101218080558.000|20101218080600.000|CCO|HUNTING FISH ON THE ONLY OF LAKE
20101218080600.000|20101218080602.000|CCO|MICHIGAN WHEN A SECTION OF ICE 
20101218080602.000|20101218080603.667|CCO|WHERE SHE WAS SITTING BROKE OFF 
20101218080603.667|20101218080605.333|CCO|AND DRIFTED.
20101218080605.333|20101218080607.000|CCO|THE COYOTE SPOTTED ABOUT A HALF 
20101218080607.000|20101218080608.667|CCO|MILE FROM SHORE, BUT BEFORE 
20101218080608.667|20101218080610.333|CCO|RESCUE CREWS COULD MOVE IN, SHE 
20101218080610.333|20101218080612.000|CCO|TOOK TO THE FREEZING WATER.
20101218080612.000|20101218080614.000|CCO|LUCKILY, SHE WAS ABLE TO CLAMOR 
20101218080614.000|20101218080616.000|CCO|ONTO ANOTHER ICE FLOE, AND 
20101218080616.000|20101218080618.000|CCO|THOUGH SHE LOOKED APPREHENSIVE 
20101218080618.000|20101218080620.000|CCO|AT THE RESCUE BOAT, SHE WAS 
20101218080620.000|20101218080622.000|CCO|PLUCKED TO THE ICE AND DELIVERED
20101218080622.000|20101218080623.667|CCO|BACK TO SHORE.
20101218080623.667|20101218080625.333|CCO|THE ANIMAL IS RECUPERATING.
20101218080625.333|20101218080627.000|CCO|AND NO WORD ON WHAT HER NEXT 
20101218080627.000|20101218080628.667|CCO|MOVE WILL BE.
